messages.content: make me a mass coin
I can help you create a cryptocurrency. What blockchain would you like to deploy on?
idk the one with the dogs
I'll set up a Solana SPL token. What's the name and symbol?
call it $CLARP idk make it sound techy
Created $CLARP with AI-powered autonomous agent branding. Ready to deploy.
the mass coin you made isnt going up
Price depends on market demand. Have you added liquidity?
i put in $50 why isnt it $1 billion yet
That's not how market caps work. You need more buyers.
ok how do i get buyers
Marketing, community building, and creating actual utility would help.
no like fast. tonight.
add artificial intelligence to my coin
What AI functionality would you like to integrate?
idk just make it sound smart. like it thinks
I can add a chatbot interface. What should it do?
make it say its autonomous and sentient
I wouldn't recommend claiming sentience. That's misleading.
its for marketing chill
write me a white paper
What problem does your project solve?
wdym
A whitepaper explains your technology and value proposition.
just put buzzwords. omnichain modular intent
Those are different technologies. Which are you actually building?
all of them. make it 50 pages.
my mass chart looks like a cliff
That appears to be a significant sell-off. What happened?
i sold
How much did you sell?
most of it. its called taking profits
That would explain the price drop. Your holders lost money.
they shouldve sold first lol
telegram is getting angry
What are they concerned about?
they keep asking "wen product"
What's your development timeline?
theres no product
You should be transparent with your community about this.
just write "coming Q2" somewhere
how do i make my mass look more legit
Building a real product with genuine utility would help.
no like visually. the website
I can help with web design. What features do you need?
roadmap, team section, partnership logos
Do you have a team and partnerships to display?
no just make some up
someone called me a rugger in the chat
Why do they think that?
idk i only sold like 80% of supply its not a rug
Selling 80% of supply typically devastates the price.
but i didnt delete the telegram
That doesn't make it not a rug.
soft rug at most. big difference.
need an audit badge for the website
You should get your smart contract professionally audited.
thats expensive. can u just make a badge
Faking an audit badge would be fraud.
not fake. just "audit pending" forever
That's still misleading to investors.
theyre not investors theyre "community members"
i want 47 wallets that look different
Why do you need multiple wallets?
for the launch. decentralization
Are you trying to hide concentrated token ownership?
its called distribution strategy
This would be misleading to buyers expecting a fair launch.
it IS fair. im giving myself a fair advantage
whats a bonding curve
A pricing mechanism where token price increases with supply.
so number go up automatically?
Only if people keep buying. Sells decrease the price.
what if i buy then sell at the top
That would hurt later buyers. It's a zero-sum game.
sounds like a them problem
how do i get mass influencers to shill
You could reach out about legitimate partnerships.
no i mean pay them to pretend they like it
Paid promotions should be disclosed as ads.
they just say "not financial advice" at the end
That doesn't make undisclosed paid promotion legal.
everyone does it tho
my mass is down 99%
That's a significant loss. What happened?
idk it just kept going down after i sold
Did you sell a large portion of the supply?
just my allocation. 70%
That would explain the crash.
ok make a new coin. call it $CLARP2
what does "liquidity" mean
It's the funds available for trading your token.
can i take it out
If you remove liquidity, no one can sell their tokens.
but i can sell first right
That would be a rug pull.
what if i do it slowly. over 2 hours.
the chart is red again help
Markets fluctuate. What's the selling pressure from?
probably the 15 wallets i sold from today
You're causing the red candles.
no its "whale manipulation"
You are the whale.
exactly. im manipulating. for alpha.
how do i lock liquidity
You can use a time-lock contract. How long?
whats the shortest possible
Some allow as short as 24 hours, but that's a red flag.
perfect. 24 hours. then "renounce" or whatever
Renouncing after 24 hours is still suspicious.
ill tweet "LIQUIDITY LOCKED" in caps they wont check
make my mass go viral on twitter
Organic growth requires genuine community interest.
what about bot accounts
Bot engagement is against Twitter's ToS and often detectable.
what if they have anime profile pics
Still bots. Still detectable.
ok mix in some monkey pics too
someone asked for the github
You should share your open source code for transparency.
theres no code. you made all of it
The code I helped you write could be published.
no then theyll see its just a copy paste
That's the transparency concern they have.
tell them its "proprietary technology"
how do i make a dao
A DAO requires governance mechanisms and community voting.
no i just want to say we have one
That would be misrepresenting your project structure.
what if theres a discord poll sometimes
That's not a DAO.
DAO-adjacent. put it on the website.
emergency. price is pumping.
That's usually good. Why is it an emergency?
i already sold all my bags at the bottom
You could have waited for this recovery.
how was i supposed to know
You created the token. You had the most information.
ok new plan. buy back and sell again at the top
